function ERU_EP04_16()
    -- .転-6【12月第2週】「姫神ネメシアの狂気」
    SaveData.Title = "姫神ネメシアの狂気"

    -- //BG：姫神邸廊下
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG013ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM10.wav")

    MSG([[ ――Let's change the location. ]])

    MSG([[ That's what Daria said, and I was led inside the mansion. ]])

    MSG([[ Only after stepping inside the mansion did I finally realize the true source of the déjà vu I'd been feeling. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2259.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “These walls... and this structure. Plus, the design of the main street we just walked through. Th-this is... no way, Yuriai Private Academy?” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ It made sense that it looked familiar. This mansion eerily replicates Yuriai Private Academy from the main gate, through the main street, all the way inside. ]])

    MSG([[ Nemesia is supposed to be aiming to reform Yuriai Private Academy. What kind of state of mind leads someone to model their own mansion after a school they want to change? ]])

    MSG([[ An abnormal obsession with Yuriai Private Academy. I felt an intense chill like nothing I'd ever experienced before. ]])

    -- //BU：ダリア（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0647.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 “Looks like you noticed, Erika-kun. As you can see, this hallway is a replica of Yuriai Private Academy’s. Pretty well done, right?” ]])

    MSG([[ Daria spoke in a calm tone as if seeing right through my inner thoughts. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0648.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 “My mother, Nemesia, is also a Yuriai Private Academy graduate. She loved the school’s traditions deeply.” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01fc")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0649.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 “But at the same time, she hated them. She believed that as long as the ‘Princess’ system exists, students would keep suffering the same despair she went through...” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2260.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “What do you mean by that? Why would students suffer despair because of the ‘Princess’ system?” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0650.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 “Who knows. Even I don’t really understand it.” ]])

    MSG([[ Daria laughed lightheartedly, brushing it off, which made me insanely angry. ]])

    MSG([[ Suffering despair because of the ‘Princess’ system? There’s no way that could be true. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

    -- //effect：セピア加工
    FILTER_SCREEN(2)
    -- //CG：姫神エルメス登場（屋内）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"EV006aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask035",1000,false)

    MSG([[ I’ve been through so much at Yuriai Private Academy. ]])

    -- //CG：鬼灯リラ登場
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"EV009aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

    MSG([[ Sometimes clashing with others, sometimes enduring pain. ]])

    -- //CG：夕陽とウランと膝枕
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"EV017aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

    MSG([[ But because we worked hard together as ‘Princesses,’ we grew to truly understand one another. ]])

    -- //CG：プチ打ち上げ（皆笑顔）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"EV018aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

    MSG([[ Even Daria. She laughed together with us. ]])

    MSG([[ There’s no way that smile was fake. ]])

    MSG([[ No one can deny the days we worked hard as ‘Princesses.’ No way I’ll let them! ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000ab")
    FILTER_SCREEN(0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask035",1000,false)
    -- //effect：セピア加工・終了)

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG013ba")
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2261.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “Thanks to the ‘Princess’ system, I was able to genuinely clash with Lira-san and Uran-san. I was able to refine my femininity.” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2262.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “There’s no way I could ever believe that’s wrong.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_plus0010.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “As the 'Battle Princess' representing Yuriai Private Academy—Erika Ikusa—I deny your words!” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("daria_plus0018.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 “So brave... makes me want to jump into bed with you right now.” ]])

    MSG([[ Daria laughed exaggeratedly. ]])

    MSG([[ But clearly, not from the bottom of her heart. I was certain she was lying again. ]])

    MSG([[ How many lies does this person have to pile up before she’s satisfied? ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0651.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 “I have never once understood Nemesia Himegami’s way of thinking. If there is one thing I do understand...” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0652.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 “It’s that you will be the first among the ‘Princesses’ here to experience despair.” ]])

    MSG([[ Daria spread her arms leisurely in the middle of the hallway, like blocking the way. ]])

    MSG([[ That unreadable stance again. ]])

    MSG([[ There’s no point in continuing this discussion. As martial artists, all that’s left is to speak with fists. ]])

    MSG([[ I stepped forward with my left hand and left foot, taking a half stance. A serious stance based on karate's left posture, infused with Ikusa-style arresting techniques. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01bb")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_plus0011.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “Daria-san, today I’m going to make you talk! By force if I have to, I want your true feelings!” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ No holding back. From now on, I will fight Daria with everything I’ve got. ]])

STOP_BGM(1000)
    --LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    -- 　　　　◆
    --LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    --SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    --WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("ERU_EP04_17")
end
